Text:
is there really only 1 person seeding these?! come on?!!?!?!?

^.^

This torrent is useless without the training videos.  The ones that come with it when you buy it (not the ones at the Lux video site which don't compare).  There should be three downloads for the Modo301 product in all.  I've asked before, months ago, but it doesn't look like we'll ever see them.

Scorpion Rojo...Hope that this installation is for WinXP and Not MAC. If its true..please tell us the fullproof instructionns to run this application under windows AS it Fails to run even after following the instructions in "install.txt" Has anyone succedeed in running it. DAMN Now even Modo 201 is also not installing :(

This is a Windows Installer. To successful installation just follow the instrucctions, I did it.... 

If you have any error, please post it so i can know what's the problem.
The install worked fine. The crack worked the first time. Now it doesnt. The program just crashes when loaded.
i was soo happy when i got this program. now it doesnt even work, it shuts down before it even starts up. i've tried re-installing 5 times and it still does the same thing. pleeeeease help!

By the way, 301 is preferable to 302 since 302 has a buggy Solid Sketch Tool; the rotation function on the selected joints does not work. Expansion and move does but not rotation. It works in 301 so by all means this is the version to have for the time being.

An exe running successfully at first and then beginning to crash more and more often can be a sign of a virus. 

In fact several virus scanners (including mine which just went off downloading this torrent) mark this keygen as a virus.

http://virscan.org/report/ca7bcbe0bd24e97dd4e1b36fde5fbac7.html
